name: Potential Driver Demo
description:
Potential Driver Isometric Racing Game Demo.

KEYBOARDS :
WSAD to move your car,

W - Accelerate

S- Brake

A- Turn left

D- Turn Right

SpaceBar- Handbreak

Spacebar is handbrake .
This game was made for the jam The america'S JAM

PLAY IN BROWSER OR IN DESKTOP , THE DESKTOP VERSION COME IN A .ZIP FILE  , PLEASE EXTRACT THE ZIP FILE IN A FOLDER AND DOUBLE CLICK  ON THE 
PotentialDriver.exe FILE FOR PLAY.

Have Fun Good luck.
